tab1.text1:
<TextStyle.Red>*****ATTENTION SURVIVORS*****</>
Welcome to the Twisted Whiskers Cluster — a world designed for adventure, strategy, and community survival. Each server presents its own challenges and opportunities. Gather resources, form alliances, and explore the unknown, where danger and wonder coexist.

<TextStyle.Orange>Cluster Overview:</>
Within the cluster, you can connect with other survivors via Discord, use the WebShop, and enjoy community events. Each server supports token-based rewards, custom mods, and unique survival mechanics.
tab1.text2:
<TextStyle.White>Current Verified Shops:</>
All registered player shops adhere to strict rules to ensure fairness and safety. Explore the Shop Info tab for details.
tab1.text3:
<TextStyle.Green>Newest Server Features:</>
- Twisted Kittens Companion In-Game Shop is back in the Radial.
- Some new features & info in-game with the AAT Button on the bottom right of the inventory screen!
- More features coming soon for the token system and community mod.
- Explore Twisted Whiskers Valguero, Twisted Whiskers ASArik (PvE addition), and Twisted Purrgatory (PvP), each with unique biomes, challenges, and adventures!

tab2.text1: Each Tribe may claim two bases per map. Solo players may have one of each. Solo players joining a tribe must dismantle their base and merge with the tribe's official location. Overclaiming results in admin action.
tab2.text2: Build your sanctuary responsibly: no blocking high-resource zones, explorer notes, or artifact caves. Mega bases require admin approval. No structure spam. Clean traps after use.
tab2.text3: No offline breeding. No egg theft. Harassment is prohibited. Admins do not mediate internal tribal drama. Respect the wild and fellow survivors.

tab3.text1: Lost tames or loot? Admins will not replace losses. Survival is part of the game’s essence. Prepare wisely.
tab3.text2: Admin requests handled in order received. Admins are human — jobs, families, and naps take priority. Abandoned creatures left at other bases or OBs are wiped without warning.
tab3.text3:
First Offense: verbal warning + 24hr notice
Second Offense: structures/tames/players may be wiped. Failure to respond = automatic second offense
Third Offense (within 30 days): permanent banishment
Report violations to ensure pride survives. Rewards for supporters and enforcers of rules.

tab4.text1:
Normal Players: Update flag monthly. Missing update = tribe wipe.
Subscribed Players: Update every 3 months. If subscription ends, follow normal schedule.
Admins: Must update every 3 months. Failure results in tribe wipe. Items/tames may be auctioned.
tab4.text2:
<TextStyle.Violet>Flag Colors:</>
- Admin Flag (180d): Jan-Jun: Azure / Twilight, Jul-Dec: Blue / Green
- Donor Flag (90d): Jan-Mar: Purple / Cyan, Apr-Jun: Magenta / Blue, Jul-Sep: Yellow / Baby Blue, Oct-Dec: Red / Navy Blue
- Free To Play (30d): Jan: Blue, Feb: Pink, Mar: Forest Green, Apr: Brick, May: Royal, Jun: Magenta, Jul: Red, Aug: Olive, Sep: Yellow, Oct: Black, Nov: Orange, Dec: Green
tab4.text3: Violations = Tribe Wipe. Any tribe with incorrect/outdated flags during a wipe is fully wiped. Partial exceptions are not allowed.
